attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present the BBFC does not allow programs with violent porn (such as S&M); even among consentual adult pretending not to give consent. 

These restrictions should not apply to cartoon characters or cartoons because they are not real people, therefore they are not suffering from the violence in any way, shape, or form.

This petition is not requesting that these materials should be available for under 18s.
